remarks: Show that the support of a function is a subset of a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
statement:
suppsssn.n $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A /\ k =/= W ) -> B = Z ) $.
suppsssn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
suppsssn $p |- ( ph -> ( ( k e. A |-> B ) supp Z ) C_ { W } ) $.
$d A k $.
$d W k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
